verbose_text: Moreover, co-incubation with LY294002 partially abrogated the anti-apoptotic effects of nicorandil on the MSCs, as evidenced by the increase in the number of Annexin V + / PI - cells (with LY294002, 21.99 +/-1.83% vs. without LY294002, 14.07 +/-1.52%; XREF_FIG and F).
evidence: LY294002 partially abrogated the anti-apoptotic effects of nicorandil
